scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules && npm run install:all
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:down && docker-compose rm -f && npm run db:up && npm run db:seed
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run deploy:prod --workspace=server
scripts.update:deps: npm update && npm update --prefix frontend && npm update --prefix backend
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && npm audit --prefix frontend && npm audit --prefix backend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix backend
scripts.format:all: npm run format --prefix frontend && npm run format --prefix backend
scripts.lint:fix:all: npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend && npm run lint:fix --prefix backend
